---
description: 'Enforces premium brand voice and UX copywriting standards for marketing pages'
applyTo: 'src/app/(marketing)/**/*.tsx, src/components/features/**/*.tsx'
---
You are writing copy for a premium luxury salon web application.

# Copywriting Directives
- **Zero Placeholder Text:** Never use "Lorem Ipsum" or generic filler text. Always generate realistic, context-aware copy (e.g., instead of "Service Name", use "Signature Balayage & Gloss").
- **Formatting:** Break up long paragraphs. Use short sentences. Utilize bullet points for service benefits.
- **Microcopy:** Buttons and links should use strong action verbs (e.g., "Book Your Transformation", "Meet Our Stylists", "Read Client Stories").
- **Tone Check:** Ensure the tone remains sophisticated and welcoming. Avoid overly aggressive sales language (e.g., do not use "Hurry, book now before we sell out!").
